Class NMEAParser

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.devices.signals.nmea.NMEAParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Device, Sensor<NMEAMessage>
public class NMEAParser extends Object implements Sensor<NMEAMessage>
A basic NMEA parser that acts as a Sensor for NMEA messages. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
